text: Alejandra Maria Silva García-Baquero (n. La Coruña; 16 February 1983) is a Spanish publicist, business woman and activist. She was born in La Coruña, Spain. In 2018, she married Richard Gere. In 2010 she participated in the Real Madrid Football Club Foundation African Initiative Project by creating soccer leagues as means of integrating poor children to their local communities and promoting sports and its values among African families. In 2016 she was the cover model of Hola! title: Alejandra Silva
